quizzes.question_text:
Lance graphed the amount of snow that fell in the last 4 days. What was the snowfall on Thursday? 
 _inches
solution: Find the Thursday bar in the graph.
Use the scale on the left side of the graph to read the value of the Thursday bar.

Thursday : 4
It snowed 4 inches on Thursday.
solution_image_tag: A bar graph titled 'Daily snowfall' showing snowfall amounts in inches across four days. The y-axis shows snowfall from 0-10 inches, and the x-axis shows days of the week. The bars show: Wednesday: ~8 inches (salmon/orange colored bar), Thursday: ~4 inches (green colored bar), Friday: ~10 inches (purple/pink colored bar), Saturday: ~9 inches (salmon/orange colored bar).
quizzes.backend_description: A bar graph showing snowfall measurements over four days. The y-axis shows 'Snowfall (inches)' from 0 to 10 with an upward arrow at 10. The x-axis shows days from Wednesday to Saturday. Each bar is a different color: Wednesday: Orange bar at 8 inches, Thursday: Light green bar at 4 inches, Friday: Pink/magenta bar at 10 inches, Saturday: Coral/salmon bar at 9 inches.

quizzes.question_text:

solution_image_tag: A bar graph titled 'GitHub activity' showing code commits amounts in commits across four days. The y-axis shows code commits from 0-10 commits, and the x-axis shows days of the week. The bars show varying heights with Monday at 5 commits.
quizzes.backend_description: A bar graph showing code commits measurements over four days. The y-axis shows 'Code Commits (commits)' from 0 to 10 with an upward arrow at 10. The x-axis shows days from Sunday to Wednesday. Each bar is a different color: Sunday: Orange bar at 2 commits, Monday: Light green bar at 5 commits, Tuesday: Pink/magenta bar at 5 commits, Wednesday: Coral/salmon bar at 7 commits.
